scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:types
scripts.build: npm run build:babel && npm run build:types && npm run build:bundle && npm run build:cp-files
scripts.build:cp-files: cp packages/js-toolkit/package.json packages/dist/ && cp LICENSE packages/dist/ && cp README.md packages/dist
scripts.build:bundle: npm run build:bundle:base && npm run build:bundle:full
scripts.build:bundle:base: npm run build:bundle:base:modern && npm run build:bundle:base:umd
scripts.build:bundle:base:modern: NODE_TARGET=bundle microbundle -i packages/js-toolkit/index.js -o packages/dist/index.modern.js -f modern --no-pkg-main --no-compress --external none
scripts.build:bundle:base:umd: NODE_TARGET=bundle microbundle -i packages/js-toolkit/index.js -o packages/dist/index.umd.js -f umd --name Base --no-pkg-main --no-compress --external none
scripts.build:bundle:full: npm run build:bundle:full:modern && npm run build:bundle:full:umd
scripts.build:bundle:full:modern: NODE_TARGET=bundle microbundle -i packages/js-toolkit/full.js -o packages/dist/full.modern.js -f modern --no-pkg-main --no-compress --external none
scripts.build:bundle:full:umd: NODE_TARGET=bundle microbundle -i packages/js-toolkit/full.js -o packages/dist/full.umd.js -f umd --name JsToolkit --no-pkg-main --no-compress --external none
